headline: Why The Narrative Around Analog Devices (ADI) Is Shifting With New Forecasts And AI Momentum
summary: Analog Devices just saw its modeled fair value price target move to $379.64 from $313.31, a change of roughly 21% in the estimate. Analysts tying their updated targets to recent Q1 and Q4 results, stronger guidance, and exposure to data center and AI trends are generally constructive, while more cautious voices point to valuation discipline, mixed end market signals, and cyclicality. Read on to see how you can track these shifting views and what to watch as the Analog Devices story continues...

headline: Baird Raises Analog Devices (ADI) Outlook as Chip Cycle Shows Recovery Momentum
summary: Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADI) is included among the 13 Best NASDAQ Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. On February 19, Baird raised its price recommendation on Analog Devices (ADI) to $365 from $275. It reiterated an Outperform rating on the shares. The firm updated its outlook after reviewing the company’s latest results, which pointed to several […]
